name: liri-node-app
description: Created an application called LIRI. LIRI is similar to iPhone's SIRI. However, while SIRI is a Speech Interpretation and Recognition Interface, LIRI is a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface. LIRI will be a command line node app that takes in parameters and gives you back data. To retrieve the data that will power this app, I will be sending requests to the Twitter, Spotify and OMDB APIs.
